content: click on how to crochet granny squares in the published in field then on the source page click on interweave com the pattern calls for 1 ball each of the following colors - soft sunrise #8243 - velvet rose #8248 - deep garnet #8249 - coral #8352 - burgundy #8254 **note ** i think the gauge in the book reads incorrectly it states 21 25 or 2 1 25 inches/ 6 5 cm square if you go by the cm measuring it should be 2 5 inches / 6 5 cm square in the crochet me ebook it states the gauge as one motif = 2 1⁄4 6 5 cm square before blocking with size b/1 2 25 mm hook
